```{r, context="render"}
# Create output for our router in main UI of Shiny app.
shinyUI(
  fluidPage(
    tagList(
      #head_tags,
      HTML('<center><br><br><img src="tidybiology_hex.png", width = "338" ></center>'),
      tags$div(
        tags$br(),
        HTML(paste("<center>Tidybiology is a resource developed by the <a href='http://www.hirscheylab.org' style='color:black;'>Hirschey Lab</a> for learning data science.</center>")), 
        tags$br(),
        tags$br()),
      HTML("<center>"),
      HTML("<a href='http://127.0.0.1:4286/code/demo.Rmd'>Get Started</a>"), 
      ", ", 
      HTML("<a href='http://127.0.0.1:4286/demo.Rmd'>browse the tracks</a>"),
      ", or",
      "search the learning materials",
      HTML("</center>")
    )
  )
)
```
